Experience

  • Fidelity Investments July 2018 - present

    Dalian,China Supervisor: Zhaopeng Liu

    • Developed a text generation model for simulation of transaction information and improved the readability using reinforcement learning techniques and altered the objective function to reduce text repetition.
    • Designed a model based on xgboost and Generative Adversarial Networks(GANs) to detect potential network breakdowns and help troubleshooting. (final accuracy around 85%)
    • Extended the usage of SN-GANs (spectral normalization GANs)to network tra c data synthesis and compared the model behaviour between Wasserstein distance and KL divergence as similarity measurement.


  • Pattern Analysis Laboratory November 2015 - May 2018

    Fort Collins,Colorado,United States Supervisor: Michael Kirby

    • Successfully identified 20 genes out of 12023 of them which have discriminatory power for early diagnosis of the infection of upper respiratory virus(over 90% balanced success rate/accuracy).
    • Implemented Sparse Support Vector Machine in C++ to speed up the training.
    • Tackled the severe sample imbalance problem using SMOTE and GANs.


  • Teaching Assistant in CSU Computer Science Department August 2017 - Jan 2018

    Fort Collins,Colorado,United States Supervisor: Prof. Yashwant K. Malaiya

    • Graded programming assignments.
    • Answered questions during office hours.
    • Led help sessions(both video and live).
